reviewText:
If you like Samurai or movies that display swordsmanship then you will love this movie, very skillfull, very unique movie, originally titled : "Yellow River Fighter". A Man's wife,daughter
and village are slaughtered. He in turn becomes a drunkard, he
ends up meeting a peasant and they become mixed up in the
politics of rival warlords. He gets blinded and manipulated
but gets his revenge against all the warlords for their treachery
and for what was done to him and his family.

this is a interesting movie. Skilled swordfights. There are no hand-to-hand fights. Only weapons. It takes place in up north China. I'd recomend it if you want to expand your collection of chinese movies.
